relation: Allow to limit ItemFetchJob to current cache content (details)
Infrastructure for showing additional dialogs from agents/resources (details)
Move the Akonadi development library from kdepim.
Change linklocator to use the new emoticon lib
newly designed gpgme++ (multithreaded, exceptions, less event loop integration: better for Windows)
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Schedules/KDE4/4.1 Feature Plan" - KDE TechBase
textBeforeTable: [edit] kdelibs 21 kdewebdev 20 kdevplatform 19 kdevelop 18 kdeutils 17 kdetoys 16 kdesdk 15 kdepim 14 kdenetwork 13 kdemultimedia 12 kdegraphics 11 kdegames 10 kdeedu 9 kdebindings 8 kdeartwork 7 kdeadmin 6 kdeaccessibility 5 kdebase-runtime 4 kdebase-workspace 3 kdebase-apps 2 kdepimlibs 1 kdelibs Contents done => completed in-progress => started, but not completed yet todo => not started yet Legend: Please ensure that any entries you have on this page are kept up to date with respect to their status (todo, in-progress or done). Any features which are not mentioned on this page must be rescheduled for 4.2 and added to the list at Schedules/KDE4/4.2 Feature
textAfterTable: DONE KHTML Support CSS3 Media Queries Germain Garand <germain@ebooksfrance.org> DONE KIO Add support for drawing text shadows in KFileItemDelegate Fredrik Höglund <fredrik@kde.org> DONE KIO Implement support for inline editing in KFileItemDelegate Fredrik Höglund <fredrik@kde.org> DONE KIO KIO::AuthInfo and PasswordDialog: optional fields (like "domain"); optional anonymous switch and flag to suppress KIO's password caching Norbert Frese <nf2@scheinwelt.at> DONE kmimetypetrader/kbuildsycoca Replace use of profilerc for ordering applications with new mimeapps.list standard David Faure <faure@kde.org> DONE knewstuff Support caching, and speed up the interface through use of Models/Views and goya Jeremy Whiting <jeremy@scitools.com>
